author: dlr
msg: A merge branch for changes from trunk targetted for Subversion 1.3
which enhances the svn_wc_status2_t data type, providing more complete
server-side information about working copy items which are out of date

author: dlr
msg: Expose the "out of date" and URI fields now available from the
svn_wc_status2_t data type to the JavaHL bindings via its Status
constructor for the Status class, extract the parameters from the
svn_wc_status2_t, and pass'em along.  Use the new
reposLastCmtAuthor): New private instance fields in which to store
any "out of date" information from the repository.
(Status): Added parameters for initialization of the new instance
(getUrl): Adjusted doc string for modified behavior of
SVNClient.cpp, which now uses svn_wc_status2_t->url (rather than

author: dlr
msg: (svn_wc_status2_t): Renamed ood_url to url, as it is now set to the
URL of the item regardless of whether the working copy is out of
make_dir_baton, make_file_baton): Renamed ood_url to url.
(tweak_statushash): If the file_baton or dir_baton contains an URI,
use it instead of the default, as it may be more up to date.
(find_dir_url): Moved upwards in the file to avoid forward
(make_dir_baton, make_file_baton): Initialize the baton's url and
ood_kind to that of the item it's being created for.
and ood_kind, which can be initialized upon edit baton creation,
since they are not entryprops (roughly analogous to DAV liveprops).

author: lundblad
msg: not an empty argument list.  That's for my C++ background:-(

author: lundblad
msg: Merge r16468 from trunk to 1.3.x branch.
Make VPATH (srcdir != builddir) doc-api builds work.
